text.name: Fell Bullet
text.desc:
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [Breath] for every [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
[EndSkill] Lose every [BoseProjektil]
coinDescs: This Coin deals damage only against the main target.
If the main target is an ally, deal +8% damage for every [BoseProjektil] (max 56%)
[AllyKill] Apply 2 [Breath] to self and 2 random allies
[AllyKillFail] Gain 1 [Breath]

This Coin deals damage only against the sub-targets
- If the first Coin failed to kill the ally, 1 random sub-target takes damage
+2% Damage on Critical Hit for every [BoseProjektil] (max 14%)
[CriticalOnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Laceration]

text.name: Fell Bullet
text.desc:

- If the said Reson. was a Pride Reson., gain (highest Reson. x 2) [BoseProjektil] instead (max 7)
[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [Breath] for every [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
[EndSkill] Lose every [BoseProjektil]
coinDescs: This Coin deals damage only against the main target.

[AllyKill] Apply 3 [Breath] to self and 2 random allies
[AllyKill] +1 E.G.O resource for the killed ally's Skill 1 and 2 Affinities
[AllyKillFail] Gain 3 [Breath]

This Coin deals damage only against the sub-targets
- If the first Coin failed to kill the ally, 1 random sub-target takes damage
+9% Damage on Critical Hit for every [BoseProjektil] (max 63%)
[CriticalOnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Laceration]

passiveList.name: Next
passiveList.desc: After Attack: if the target is killed, gain +2 [Breath] Count (2 times per turn)
